p.p: This field contains the URL for the W3 Standard Schema.
Fields VERSION to GLOBAL.SCHEMA form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 70 characters may be entered.

p.p: This field denotes the XML version, currently being used.
Fields VERSION to GLOBAL.SCHEMA form a related multi value set.

desc.p: A maximum of 30 characters may be entered.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
